subject: Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: At less than $8 for an hour of fishing, anglers in a basement in Seoul, South Korea, are given a 4-foot fiberglass rod and bait that looks like dog food.
snippet: At less than $8 for an hour of fishing, anglers in a basement in Seoul, South Korea, are given a 4-foot fiberglass rod and bait that looks like dog food.
